column4: i have made a mistake in the /etc/sudoers file.. so when i now try to issue 'sudo su' i'm given an error.. how can i fix this?
you can always boot from a live cd, mount your disk and edit the file there
if you can't boot from a live cd, you can try to hit esc at grub menu, hit e to edit boot entry and change init=bla to init=/bin/bash, then hit enter and b to boot into a shell
